text: Ra jaba musa, hamile nirdharita gareko samayama a'e ra unako palanakartale unisita kura garyo ta unale vinti gare ki he mero palanakarta! Mala'i aphno saksatkara gara'unus taki ma tapa'ila'i eka drsti herihalum . Allahale bhannubhayoh timile mala'i kadapi herna sakdainau tara timi tyasa parvatatira herdaigara, yadi tyo aphno thamuma sthira rahyo bhane timile mala'i herna saknechau. Ani jaba unako raba parvatamathi aphno prakasa hale ta prakasale tyasala'i cakanacura (ksataviksata) garidiyo ra musa (alaihis'salama) mukrsita bha'i lad'ihale. Ani jaba hosama a'e ta bhane, ‘‘pavitrachaum timi!’’ Ma timi samaksa tauba (pascatapa) gardaichu ra ma sababhanda pahile tapa'imathi imana lya'une bha'eko chu
